title: New gamemode idea...
body:
Criticize me as much as you like. I want some nostalgia for this game, i know its not going to happen but do hear me out. 
With the week rotations for stuff like urf and one for all and the others, why cant, and why havent, they thought of a sort of "classic" mode, where maybe the map is the old s4 map and maybe all the champs are back to their original states, unpatched gameplay... im not a game developer i have no idea what it takes but i think that reliving the days from when i had no clue what i was doing would be a great experience for a weekend.

replies.body:
The problem with that is riot doesn't likely keep all the code for champs prior states (let alone the old map)

Also a lot of champions had massive bugs involved pre patches so you'd also have that problem (remember release Azir?)

Yeah man i do remember, and yeah they dont keep the old code, completely true.. but what about the old map? i mean as i said i have no clue when it comes to coding and what not but it would be pretty amazing to play on that old map every now and then haha..
There is a custom map of the old Summoner's Rift which you can use. Right now however, it doesn't work, but there is a fix being worked on. https://mapskins.com/original-summoners-rift/
